column4: hello. I am using Ubuntu 10.10. When I suspend my laptop, it does indeed suspend. But when I press the power button to resume, it simply restarts. Is there a solution to this problem?
Did you try waking it up with the keyboard instead (if your laptop supports that)?
no i need to press the power button. that's how i have always done it.
Oh, sorry, didn't know it worked on 10.04, you can ignore me then.
